entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 4 April 2023
